4318010.name: Infinite Game Cartridge Collection - Coffee Warz
4318010.description:
This DLC adds the game Coffee Warz to the collection.

Coffee Warz is a fast-paced, roguelike action game set in an office building gone mad. Take control of the business by battling employees, janitors, and electricians who stand between you and ultimate caffeine supremacy.

Every floor is randomly generated, filled with dangerous enemies and unpredictable encounters. Plan your moves carefully, because the enemies get stronger the higher you climb. Fight, level up, and try to clear each floor before pushing onward—strategy and timing are key.
